A common question regarding CME gaps; why are we still focusing on them?  The point is; because the majority of the market uses them as a variable for support/resistance levels -> they work.   That's how a market evolves.   Similarly with 200-Week MA, for instance.  $BTC

Why most charts look the same?   Simply because most altcoins are pegged directly with #bitcoin. The majority of market makers hedge their risk with #BTC to reduce that.  #Altcoin markets should follow the basic supply & demand rule and be completely decoupled. #LetAltcoinsGrow
